DCheckBox/DoClick.description: Called when the checkbox is clicked by a user. If you are overriding this, you must call

DCheckBox/GetChecked.description: Gets the checked state of the checkbox.

DCheckBox/IsEditing.description: Returns whether the state of the checkbox is being edited. This means whether the user is currently clicking (mouse-down) on the checkbox, and applies to both the left and right mouse buttons.

DCheckBox/OnChange.description: Called when the "checked" state is changed.

DCheckBox/SetChecked.description: Sets the checked state of the checkbox. Does not call the checkbox's

DCheckBox/SetValue.description: Sets the checked state of the checkbox, and calls the checkbox's

DCheckBox/Toggle.description: Toggles the checked state of the checkbox, and calls the checkbox's
